item.title: 333 - Excuses and Rationalizations Are Not Valid… And We Know That (Dan Cnossen)
item.description: 333 - Excuses and Rationalizations Are Not Valid… And We Know That (Dan Cnossen) Excuses and Rationalizations [[The Log]] Breaking down long term goals into short term procedures The next ball, the next step [[Focus on the Next Step]] Think about this when playing tennis
